activities.name: Shanghai Museum
activities.description: Explore China's rich history through ancient Chinese art and artifacts. The Shanghai museum offers sighting of rare artifacts of the Chinese culture. Exhibits include Ancient Chinese Bronze, Sculpture, Jades, Numismatics, and many more.

activities.name: Guanfu Museum
activities.description: Discover traditional Chinese craftsmanship, antique furniture, ceramics, and calligraphy in this private art museum.

activities.name: Shanghai Foodie Tour
activities.description: Experience authentic local cuisine with guided tastings in hidden alleyways and bustling markets.

activities.name: Culinary Backstreets Tour
activities.description: Explore Shanghai's hidden food gems with expert guides, sampling dishes at family-run eateries.

activities.name: Shanghai Bund Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a scenic evening cruise along the Huangpu River, offering views of both historic and modern Shanghai.
activities.location: Zhongshan East 1st Rd, The Bund, Shanghai

activities.name: Shanghai Tower Observation Deck
activities.description: Get panoramic views from China's tallest building at the Shanghai Tower’s observation deck.
activities.location: 501 Yincheng Middle Rd, Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai

activities.name: Yuyuan Garden
activities.description: Stroll through a classical Chinese garden in the heart of the city, filled with pavilions, ponds, and rockeries.

activities.name: Jade Buddha Temple
activities.description: Visit a serene Buddhist temple housing two jade Buddha statues brought from Burma.

activities.name: French Concession Walk
activities.description: Explore the charming tree-lined streets of Shanghai's historic French Concession district with colonial architecture and local shops.

activities.name: Shanghai Disneyland
activities.description: Experience Disney magic with themed attractions, shows, and entertainment for all ages.

activities.name: Urban Planning Exhibition Center
activities.description: Learn about Shanghai's development through interactive exhibits and a large-scale city model.

activities.name: Propaganda Poster Art Centre
activities.description: View a unique collection of Chinese propaganda posters from the Mao era in this underground gallery.

activities.name: Shanghai Circus World
activities.description: Enjoy a spectacular acrobatic performance showcasing Chinese culture, music, and daring stunts.

activities.name: Shanghai Zoo
activities.description: Visit one of China's oldest zoos, home to diverse wildlife including pandas, big cats, and tropical birds.

activities.name: Power Station of Art
activities.description: China’s first state-run contemporary art museum, located in a former power plant, showcasing innovative art exhibitions.

activities.name: Shanghai Natural History Museum
activities.description: Explore dinosaurs, ancient fossils, and immersive nature displays at one of China's largest natural history museums.

activities.name: Shanghai Brewery Tour
activities.description: Taste locally brewed craft beers and learn about Shanghai’s growing beer scene with expert guides.

activities.name: Shanghai Dim Sum Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to make authentic Chinese dumplings and dim sum in this hands-on culinary experience.

activities.name: Jin Jiang Hotel Shanghai
activities.description: A historic luxury hotel located in the former French Concession, blending classic architecture with modern comfort.

activities.name: Dinner at Oriental Pearl Tower
activities.description: Enjoy dinner with a panoramic view at the revolving restaurant inside Shanghai’s iconic Oriental Pearl Tower.

activities.name: Nanjing East Road Night Walk
activities.description: Explore the lively lights, shops, and street snacks of Nanjing East Road with a knowledgeable local guide.

activities.name: Shanghai Pudong Marriott Hotel
activities.description: Modern skyscraper hotel offering top-tier business amenities, skyline views, and convenient access to Lujiazui.

activities.name: Chinese New Year Festival (Seasonal)
activities.description: Celebrate with fireworks, lanterns, and traditional performances throughout Shanghai during the Spring Festival.

activities.name: Zhujiajiao Water Town Excursion
activities.description: Take a relaxing boat ride and explore ancient bridges and alleyways in this historic water town near Shanghai.

activities.name: Traditional Crafts Workshop
activities.description: Participate in a hands-on experience crafting paper-cuttings, fans, or silk embroidery guided by local artisans.

activities.name: Shanghai Coffee Crawl
activities.description: Sample the city’s finest artisanal coffee across trendy neighborhoods with a knowledgeable caffeine connoisseur.

activities.name: SWFC Observatory Night Entry
activities.description: Ascend to the top floors of Shanghai World Financial Center for an evening view of the dazzling skyline.

activities.name: The PuLi Hotel and Spa
activities.description: Luxury urban resort blending contemporary design and serene spaces in the heart of Jing’an.

activities.name: Shanghai Fashion Week (Seasonal)
activities.description: Witness emerging designers and top fashion shows at venues across the city during this semi-annual event.

activities.name: Shanghai Tea Tasting Experience
activities.description: Sample premium Chinese teas and learn traditional brewing techniques in a peaceful tea house setting.

activities.name: K11 Art Mall & KE Center
activities.description: A fusion of shopping and contemporary art installations offering rotating exhibits from Chinese and international artists.

activities.name: Authentic Hotpot Experience
activities.description: Dine like a local with a traditional hotpot meal featuring a wide range of meats, vegetables, and dipping sauces.

activities.name: Capella Shanghai Jian Ye Li
activities.description: A boutique luxury hotel in a restored Shikumen compound, offering French-Asian fusion design and private courtyards.

activities.name: Dragon Boat Festival (Seasonal)
activities.description: Watch colorful dragon boat races and enjoy traditional sticky rice dumplings during this cultural summer celebration.
activities.location: Suzhou Creek and other locations, Shanghai

activities.name: Qibao Old Street Food Tour
activities.description: Stroll through the ancient Qibao Town while sampling local delicacies like stinky tofu, rice cakes, and candied fruits.

activities.name: Shanghai Auto Museum
activities.description: Explore the evolution of automobiles with over 100 classic cars and interactive exhibits in China’s first auto museum.

activities.name: Fairmont Peace Hotel
activities.description: An iconic art-deco hotel overlooking the Bund, offering heritage suites, fine dining, and jazz evenings.

activities.name: Lantern Festival (Seasonal)
activities.description: Celebrate the end of Chinese New Year with glowing lantern displays, riddles, and sweet tangyuan desserts.

activities.name: Tianzifang Artist Quarters
activities.description: Wander through this artsy labyrinth of renovated alleyways filled with galleries, studios, shops, and cafes.

activities.name: Shanghai Night Food Tour by Bike
activities.description: Cycle through local neighborhoods at night and taste a variety of Shanghai street foods with an expert guide.

activities.name: Shanghai Museum of Glass
activities.description: An interactive museum showcasing artistic and scientific applications of glass with hands-on workshops.

activities.name: Waldorf Astoria Shanghai on the Bund
activities.description: Luxury accommodation in a neoclassical building with river views, fine dining, and old-world elegance.

activities.name: Mid-Autumn Festival (Seasonal)
activities.description: Celebrate the harvest moon with lanterns, storytelling, and mooncakes shared among friends and family.

activities.name: Contemporary Drama at Shanghai Grand Theatre
activities.description: Attend cutting-edge Chinese and international theater performances at the architecturally stunning Grand Theatre.
